src:
Wargaming lança World of Warships: Legends em formato físico para PS4 e Xbox One (Vídeo)
A Firepower Deluxe Edition estará disponivel a partir do dia 15 de Novembro.

05 Nov 2019, 09:32

A Wargaming, em parceria com a editora de jogos norte-americana Gearbox Publishing, anunciou o lançamento de uma edição especial do MMORPG World of Warships: Legends em formato físico para a PlayStation 4 e Xbox One.
A Firepower Deluxe Edition oferece aos jogadores vários conteúdos premium, incluindo moeda extra para o jogo e os navios de guerra Iwaki, Kamikaze, Texas e Arizona.
A Wargaming avança, ainda, que as versões PS4 e Xbox One de Firepower Deluxe Edition estarão disponíveis nas lojas europeias a partir do dia 15 de Novembro com um PVP recomendado desde 39,99 euros.
text:
Wargaming Releases World of Warships: Legends in Physical Format for PS4 and Xbox One (Video)
Firepower Deluxe Edition will be available from November 15th.

05 Nov 2019, 09:32

Wargaming, in partnership with US game publisher Gearbox Publishing, has announced the release of a special edition of MMORPG World of Warships: Legends in physical format for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
Firepower Deluxe Edition offers players a variety of premium content, including extra game currency and Iwaki, Kamikaze, Texas and Arizona warships.
Wargaming further states that the PS4 and Xbox One versions of Firepower Deluxe Edition will be available in European stores from 15 November with a recommended PVP starting at 39.99 euros.
